lexUnit.name: slaughter.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: kill (animals) for food or kill (people) in a cruel or violent way.

sentence.text: This is how they are currently treated when we use them as research tools or slaughter them for consumption at our tables .

A GUNMAN slaughtered six people in cold blood because he had been evicted .
